title: China today. No. 8205
creator_credit: Film Studio of the Peoples Republic of China
brief_description: Shows various aspects of China. An ancient city - Logang - showing its history and development. Adopting new techniques and building new high voltage power lines and towers. Working a new power shovel - sewage treatment. A family reunion - a man returning to the mainland of china. A new Archbishop is ordained in the Christian faith. The filming of “Midnight” a motion film.
